title: Booty Nomad
description: Having just broken up with the "love-of-his-life," euphemistically redubbed the Eater of Souls, David finds himself stranded in the romantic desert of New York City with his best friends--Jim and Annie--until he meets the Goddess, a gorgeous single woman who turns his life upside down. A first novel. Reprint. 15,000 first printing.
author: Scott Mebus
